name: Pacifist Monk
description:
Game where you, as a player, can cut lifelines of every character you meet. Try to help this little pacifist monk with this power, until he reaches the great sacred mountain.

Game made in 3h15 by two people:

  • Vylma: Artist 2D
  • Pitivie: Developer

Music credit:

Auteur: Naoya Sakamata
Track: Kindness and Resonance
Licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.fr
Source: Télécharger gratuitement Naoya Sakamata - Kindness and Resonance
